properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters From Cape Flattery To James Island Out 10 Nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 19 at 2:25AM PST until February 19 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Seattle WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...East winds 15 to 25 kt near the west entrance to the
Strait of Juan de Fuca.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters From Cape Flattery To James Island Out
10 Nm.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33 knots
and/or seas 10 feet or higher are expected to produce hazardous
wave conditions to small craft. Inexperienced mariners,
especially those operating smaller vessels should avoid
navigating in these conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON
